column4: what is the best way to connect remotely from windows using SSH? putty?
putty works great for me, supports X forwarding as well, that or use VNC if you need GUI
putty is the answer, awesome little stand alone app, runs off a usb drive if needed
i always check with lynx before i go on a mad diagnosis just to see if its anything silly "lynx www.example.com" from the command line
